events.heading: Yan vs Dvalishvili
events.desc: UFC Fight Night: Yan vs. Dvalishvili is a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on March 11, 2023, at The Theater at Virgin Hotels in Paradise, Nevada part of the Las Vegas Metropolitan Area, United States.

events.heading: Vera vs Sandhagen
events.desc: UFC on ESPN: Vera vs. Sandhagen is a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on March 25, 2023, at the AT&T Center in San Antonio, Texas, United States.
